channel.title: Patchblocks to Axoloti
channel.description: Is it possible to transfer or rewrite a patch in Axoloti for the patchblocks programmable mini synth?? I am totally new to this but they seem VERY SIMILAR. THANKS!!!

item.title: Patchblocks to Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @servandisco servando barreiro
item.description:
@servandisco wrote:

Nope. they are different platforms. both standalone hardware with graphical programming interface but not compatible w each other.
Although.. Rewrite? yes. Axoloti it's waay more powerful than Pb so anything Patchblocks does, Axoloti can do.

Read full topic
